title: All natural Chiropractic
cleaned_text: Donahoe after some persuasion from my wife. My left arm was numb and had limited strength in my hand...I have all the feeling back in my arm and all strength in my hands." Greg W. 05/13/2011 "In 1998 I had a shoulder injury. I lived with it for about 11 years before I came to Dr. Donahoe... my pain is very minimal now. My back and neck are 100% better." Robert F. "Dr. Todd has been a major help to me since he came to Waynesboro... He keeps my muscles in check and keeps me relatively painless. Thank you Dr. Todd!"
